title: Tender for supply and  delivery of DI Pipes, Fittings, Specials, Accessories  DI/CI Valves, Manhole Covers and Surface Boxes for Eastern Province Water Sector Development Project
decision_details: - the proposal made by Hon. Dinesh Gunawardena, Minister of Water Supply and Drainage, to award the above contract for a sum of US $6,559,685.50 and Rs.97,932,053.18, as recommended by the Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee (CAPC), was approved by the Cabinet.
